item.title: Making a static site with Hugo
item.description: So, Hugo. Why a static site generator, and why exactly Hugo, you ask? Well, a static site is much more faster, secure and simple to host compared to any dynamic site (read: Wordpress). In this part, we’ll set up all the things we need for hugo to work.
